org.xbmc.api.business

Interface IVideoManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoManager

    public interface IVideoManager
extends IManager
    This is the interface between the presentation layer and the business layer. All the controller of the presentation layer gets to see is this interface.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • setPlaylistVideo

        void setPlaylistVideo(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                    int position,
                    Context context)
        Sets the media at playlist position to be the next item to be played.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        position - Position, starting with 0.

      • removeFromPlaylist

        void removeFromPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                      java.lang.String path,
                      Context context)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Parameters:
        position - Complete path (including filename) of the media to be removed.

      • getPlaylist

        void getPlaylist(DataResponse<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> response,
               Context context)
        Returns an array of videos on the playlist. Empty array if nothing is playing.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object

      • getPlaylistPosition

        void getPlaylistPosition(DataResponse<java.lang.Integer> response,
                       Context context)
        Returns the position of the currently playing video in the playlist. First position is 0.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object

        Put in here everything that has to be cleaned up after leaving an activity.
